description: Try our easy to follow Leftover Roast Pork Pesto And Slaw Ciabatta recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Roast pork,Roast,Seafood free,Apple,Pork,Quick & easy lunch,Christmas leftovers,Leftovers
name: Leftover Roast Pork Pesto And Slaw Ciabatta Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 granny smith apple, quartered, cored, thinly sliced

recipeInstructions.text: Combine green and red cabbage, carrot and mayonnaise in a bowl. Season. Place base of rolls onto serving plates and spoon slaw onto rolls. Top with apple slices, roast pork, crackling and a drizzle of pesto (see tip). Cover filling with roll tops and serve.
